txt.en: Sigvith can be found at Zarkul-sulûn.\n\nYou have repaired many of the damaged barricades at Zarkul-sulûn. You should report back to Sigvith.
After winning a foothold at Zarkul-sulûn, the dwarves of the Gabil'akkâ must maintain a defence lest it fall back into the hands of the Orcs of Gundabad.
Damaged barricades can be found throughout Zarkul-sulûn.\n\nSigvith has asked you to repair barricades damaged in the siege of Zarkul-sulûn.

'What a battle, my friend!

'The Orcs at Zarkul-sulûn were no match for the might of the Gabil'akkâ! Ha-ha!

'After the battle's end, I discovered many barricades damaged in the fighting. Damaged, but not beyond repair! If these barricades were repaired and fortified, they might yet prove valuable in our defence of Zarkul-sulûn.

'Repair them and see that no weakness can be found in our new defences!'
'Very good!\n\n'Barricades alone may not stop Gorgar and his Orcs, but they will do much to aid in the defence of Zarkul-sulûn!'
